about_the_game:
Grove Keeper takes you to an ancient, enchanted world inspired by Norse and Slavic mythology. You play the role of a Forest Deity protecting your Grove against an onslaught of loggers and poachers. Use your powers to grow trees, summon guardians, set traps, and employ magic to defend, and eventually conquer your human oppressors.

This fantasy, real-time strategy game lets you fight back against deforestation and the destruction of natural landscapes. Featuring 21 unique levels of wave-based gameplay, 15 guardians to control, 15 human enemies to defend against, 7 powers to wield, an RPG-style progression system, countless upgrade decisions and stats galore. Do you have what it takes to save the Grove?!

FEATURES

Grow Your Forest!Create trees to provide you with magic energy. Manage an economy and make strategic decisions.

Summon 15 Forest GuardiansEach of your guardians have different abilities and specialties to utilise.

15 Enemy TypesFight against increasing levels of woodcutters, poachers and warriors in an intense battle for survival.

7 Powers to Wield
Call down fiery chaos to burn your foes, summon tempestial storms, conjure up regenerative runes, and more.

21 Levels to Play Across Defend 5 locations across the four seasons each with their own unique mechanics and influences. A bonus 6th location opens to those who have proven themselves. 

Control Sites of Power Compete with the enemy over powerful landmarks that will allow you summon more Guardians.   

Stats Galore Hundreds of stats to analyse and help you figure out the strategy that works best for your play style.

  • Processor: i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 20XX or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7 or equivalent
